# Infographic Submission

## Submission Instructions

Before moving forward with your project, it's important to receive feedback on your infographic. This checkpoint ensures you're on the right track and allows you to make any necessary adjustments before final submission.

### Why Submit for Feedback?

Receiving feedback at this stage helps you:
- Confirm you've understood the assignment requirements
- Identify any areas that need improvement
- Build on your strengths
- Save time by catching issues early

### How to Submit Your Infographic

1. Make sure your infographic draft is complete with all required elements
2. Save your file in an appropriate format (.jpg, .png, or .pdf recommended)
3. Use the submission link in the assignment portal
4. Include a brief note (1-2 sentences) explaining what you'd specifically like feedback on

### What Happens Next

After submission, your instructor will review your infographic and provide constructive feedback within 2-3 school days. You'll be notified when feedback is available.

Please wait for this feedback before proceeding to the next stage of your assignment. Once you've received feedback and made any necessary revisions, you'll be ready to move forward with confidence.

Click the "Submit" button below to upload your infographic draft.
